column3: produced by wondagurl   drake yeahsound sound sound yeah real 6 side shit sickos ah man   drake yeah when you get to where i'm at you gotta remind 'em where the fuck you at every time they motherfuckin' treasure map and ain't told no one where the fuck it's at shout out to the g's from the ends we don't love no girls from the ends i'm gon hit 'em with the wham once again i'ma always end chance it i be with the bands like a nigga went to jackson state or grambling young nick cannon with the snare drum dancin' watch the way i handle it uh bring it to the bedroom you know that shit is
